name: INObject
desc: A representation of a custom intent parameter or response property.

items.name: init(identifier: String?, display: String, subtitle: String?, image: INImage?)
items.desc: Creates a custom intent object with full display information.

items.name: init(identifier: String?, display: String)
items.desc: Creates a custom intent object with the specified identifier and display string.

items.name: init(identifier: String?, display: String, pronunciationHint: String?, subtitle: String?, image: INImage?)
items.desc: Creates a custom intent object with the specified attributes.

items.name: init(identifier: String?, display: String, pronunciationHint: String?)
items.desc: Creates a custom intent object with the specified attributes.

items.name: var displayString: String
items.desc: A name or description for the custom intent object.

items.name: var subtitleString: String?
items.desc: Additional details about the custom intent object.

items.name: var displayImage: INImage?
items.desc: An image to display alongside the custom intent objectâ€™s text.

items.name: var identifier: String?
items.desc: A string that identifies the custom intent object within your app.

items.name: var pronunciationHint: String?
items.desc: A hint that describes how to pronounce the custom intent object.

items.name: var alternativeSpeakableMatches: [INSpeakableString]?
items.desc: An array of alternative speakable strings that identify the object.
